content: the sweater has a distinctly vintage cut reimagined with clean pure lines it s a timeless versatile and feminine piece that accentuates the shoulder line and silhouette creating an elegant hourglass figure whether you choose bold colors or classic hues this sweater can serve as both a wardrobe staple and a statement piece depending on your style preferences size s m upper hip size s 79 cm m 88 cm gauge 19st x 32st = 10cm x 10cm any yarn that meets the gauge would work this allows for a variety of styles ranging from a light summer linen blouse to a cozy winter sweater yarn in m 900 940 knitted bottom up in 2 pieces that are seamed together
